newsitem.title: BRAZIL: RESEARCH ALERT - Brazil CSN still a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Brazil CSN still a buy.

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers said it was maintaining its buy rating on Brazilian private steelmaker CSN, which led the winning Valepar consortium at Tuesday's auction of a 41.73 percent voting stake in mining giant CVRD.
-- It also said it reiterated its hold recommendation on steelmakers Acesita, Cosipa and CST.
-- It said in a report CSN's entry into the mining sector is a positive sign for the company as it will reinforce its supply of iron ore for steel-making.

-- Salomon Brothers believes CSN's participation in CVRD will significantly change the steel equation in Brazil. CVRD's participation in flat steel products through CSN, Usiminas and CST will redefine the industry and its future consolidation.
-- CSN shares were down 0.79 percent at 37.50 reais, CST preferred was flat at 14.50 reais, while Acesita preferred was flat at 2.53 reais. Cosipa preferred shares were not traded earlier.
